name: Eugene Radchenko

education.title: Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Software Engineering
education.meta: Kiev National University of Trade and Economics, August 2021 â€“ June 2025

about:
Hi, my name is Eugene and my passion is programming. My journey began at the age of 14, when I became interested in IT.
 At that time, I thought about my future and firmly decided to associate my life with software development.
 At the beginning, I tried to learn the basics of software development on courses, but fortunately, I quickly realized that only self-discipline and hard work can help to achieve a result.
 Overtime, I was starting to help many people to get into Java development, improving my skills along the way. I have read many books, articles, and technical references.
 At the same time, I was doing various kinds of test tasks, committing to an Open Source project, and also met an amazing person who gave me the opportunity to create a potentially commercial product.
 If you've read this to the end, I'd like to add that my passion is to become a good engineer,constantly work and interact with people and be a good person :)
